articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: The Great Indian Kapil Show: Rohit Sharma reveals how he felt when India lost World Cup 2023 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Australia defeated India by 6 wickets in the World Cup final. Rohit Sharma opened up about the loss in the latest episode of The Great Indian Kapil Show. | Web Series
articles.content: Cricketers Rohit Sharma and Shreyas Iyer were guests on the second episode of The Great Indian Kapil Show. In the episode, Rohit finally shared his thoughts on losing World Cup 2023 to Australia in N… [+2715 chars]
